There’s a tiny correction to post/2009/Perl 5 Babysteps 02 - User Input thanks to an inaccuracy about chomp that chromatic pointed out. I’ve also added a little bit to Read More Perl that refers to some of the efforts to define best practices for Perl.

My goodness but there were a lot of errors on post/2007/JRuby . Those have been fixed.
